00019   template <typename DDS_QOS, typename INITIALIZER>
00020   class BaseTopicQos : public DDS_QOS {
00021   public:
00022     BaseTopicQos() {
00023       // @AC: This really is a shortcut, the initializer should not
00024       // rely on the DomainParticipant. Fix this in SIMD v1.0
00025       ::dds::DomainParticipant dp = 
00026         ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_participant();
00027       INITIALIZER initializer(dp);
00028       initializer(*this);
00029     }
00030 
00031     ~BaseTopicQos() { }
00032 
00033   public:
00034     // -- Reliability Qos
00035     void set_reliable() {
00036       this->reliability.kind = DDS::RELIABLE_RELIABILITY_QOS;
00037     }
00038     void set_reliable(DDS::Duration_t timeout) {
00039       this->reliability.kind = DDS::RELIABLE_RELIABILITY_QOS;
00040       this->reliability.max_blocking_time = timeout;
00041     }
00042     void set_best_effort() {
00043       this->reliability.kind = DDS::BEST_EFFORT_RELIABILITY_QOS;
00044     }
00045   
00046     // -- Durability Qos
00047     void set_volatile() {
00048       this->durability.kind = DDS::VOLATILE_DURABILITY_QOS;
00049     }
00050 
00051     void set_transient_local() {
00052       // Not a bug, on OpenSplice DDS TRANSIENT_LOCAL gets anyway TRANSIENT behaviour
00053       this->durability.kind = DDS::TRANSIENT_DURABILITY_QOS;
00054     }
00055   
00056     void set_transient() {
00057       this->durability.kind = DDS::TRANSIENT_DURABILITY_QOS;
00058     }
00059 
00060 
00061     void set_persistent() {
00062       this->durability.kind = DDS::PERSISTENT_DURABILITY_QOS;
00063     }
00064   
00065     // -- Latency Budget Qos
00066     void set_latency_budget(DDS::Duration_t latency_budget) {
00067       this->latency_budget.duration = latency_budget;
00068     }
00069 
00070     // -- Deadline Qos 
00071     void set_deadline(DDS::Duration_t deadline) {
00072       this->deadline.period = deadline;
00073     }
00074 
00075     // -- Destination Order Qos
00076     void set_source_order() {
00077       this->destination_order.kind = DDS::BY_SOURCE_TIMESTAMP_DESTINATIONORDER_QOS;
00078     }
00079     void set_dest_order() {
00080       this->destination_order.kind = DDS::BY_RECEPTION_TIMESTAMP_DESTINATIONORDER_QOS;
00081     }
00082 
00083     // -- History Qos
00084     void set_keep_all() {
00085       this->history.kind = DDS::KEEP_ALL_HISTORY_QOS;
00086     }
00087 
00088     void set_keep_last(int k = 1) {
00089       this->history.kind = DDS::KEEP_LAST_HISTORY_QOS;
00090       this->history.depth = k;
00091     }
00092 
00093     // -- Resource Limits
00094     void set_resource_limits(long max_samples, long max_instances, long max_samples_per_instance) {
00095       this->resource_limits.max_samples = max_samples;
00096       this->resource_limits.max_instances = max_instances;
00097       this->resource_limits.max_samples_per_instance = max_samples_per_instance;
00098     }
00099 
00100     // -- Ownership Qos
00101     void set_shared_ownership() {
00102       this->ownership.kind = DDS::SHARED_OWNERSHIP_QOS;
00103     }
00104 
00105     void set_exclusive_ownership() {
00106       this->ownership.kind = DDS::EXCLUSIVE_OWNERSHIP_QOS;
00107     }
00108 
00109   };

00212   template <typename DDS_QOS, typename INITIALIZER>
00213   class BasePubSubQos : public DDS_QOS {
00214   public:
00215     BasePubSubQos() {
00216       ::dds::DomainParticipant dp =
00217         ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_participant();
00218       INITIALIZER initializer(dp);
00219       initializer(*this);
00220     }
00221 
00222     ~BasePubSubQos() { }
00223 
00224   public:
00225     void set_instance_presentation(bool coherent, bool ordered) {
00226       this->presentation.access_scope = DDS::INSTANCE_PRESENTATION_QOS;
00227       this->presentation.coherent_access = coherent;
00228       this->presentation.ordered_access = ordered;
00229     }
00230 
00231     void set_topic_presentation(bool coherent, bool ordered) {
00232       this->presentation.access_scope = DDS::TOPIC_PRESENTATION_QOS;
00233       this->presentation.coherent_access = coherent;
00234       this->presentation.ordered_access = ordered;
00235     }
00236   
00237     void set_group_presentation(bool coherent, bool ordered) {
00238       this->presentation.access_scope = DDS::GROUP_PRESENTATION_QOS;
00239       this->presentation.coherent_access = coherent;
00240       this->presentation.ordered_access = ordered;
00241     }
00242 
00243   
00244     void set_partition(const std::string& partition) {
00245       this->partition.name.length (1);
00246       this->partition.name[0] = DDS::string_dup(partition.c_str());
00247     }
00248 
00249   
00250     void set_partition(const std::vector<std::string>& partitions) {
00251       this->partition.name.length (partitions.size());
00252       for (uint32_t i = 0; i < partitions.size(); ++i) 
00253         this->partition.name[i] = DDS::string_dup(partitions[i].c_str());
00254     }
00255   };
